meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sublime.
meanings.sent1: The sublimity of the mountain peak took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The sublimity of the sunset filled me with awe.
meanings.sent3: The sublimity of the ice cream sundae made me forget about my diet.
meanings.sent4: The sublimity of the symphony transported me to another world.
meanings.sent5: The sublimity of the waterfall was truly magnificent.

meanings.sent1: She gazed in wonder at the sublimity of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The sublimity of the ancient ruins left us speechless.
meanings.sent3: The sublimity of the oversized cupcake made her eyes widen in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The sublimity of the starlit sky was like a blanket of diamonds above us.
meanings.sent5: The sublimity of the old oak tree was a sight to behold.
